PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-04762016-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS,  IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct issues identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations and thereby improve the overall clarity and consistency of the Regulations; and (2) update an obsolete legislative reference to align with the 2008 Immigration and Refugee Protection Act amendments and update an obsolete regulatory reference to align with the 2012 amendments to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0136 Publication Date: 2016-06-29
AttachmentsAttachment
